author: Ma-gi-cian
message: Add tests with assertAllClose for floating point operations

files.patch:
@@ -108,6 +108,12 @@ def testSparseExpandDims(self):
       (math_ops.negative, [1.0, -1.0, 3.0, -4.0], [-1.0, 1.0, -3.0, 4.0]),
       (math_ops.sign, [3.0, -2.0, 0.0, -4.0], [1.0, -1.0, 0.0, -1.0]),
       (math_ops.square, [1.0, -1.0, 3.0, -4.0], [1.0, 1.0, 9.0, 16.0]),
+      (math_ops.asinh, [1.0, -1.0, 3.0, -4.0], [ 0.8813736, -0.8813736 , 1.8184465, -2.0947125]),
+      (math_ops.sin, [1.0, -1.0, 3.0, -4.0], [ 0.84147096, -0.84147096 ,0.14112  , 0.7568025]),
+      (math_ops.asin, [1.0, -1.0, 0.4, -0.5], [1.5707964,  -1.5707964  , 0.41151685, -0.5235988]),
+      (math_ops.tan, [1.0, -1.0, 0.4, -0.5], [ 1.5574077 , -1.5574077 ,  0.42279324 ,-0.5463025]),
+      (math_ops.atan, [0.4, -0.4, 1.0, 0.5], [0.3805064, -0.3805064,  0.7853982,  0.4636476]),
+      (math_ops.atanh, [0.4, -0.4, -0.5, 0.5], [0.42364895, -0.42364895, -0.54930615,  0.54930615])
   ])
   def testUnarySparseDispatch(self, op, values, expected):
     st = sparse_tensor.SparseTensor(
@@ -117,7 +123,7 @@ def testUnarySparseDispatch(self, op, values, expected):
     result = op(st)
     result_value = self.evaluate(result)
     self.assertAllEqual(result_value.indices, st.indices)
-    self.assertAllEqual(result_value.values, expected)
+    self.assertAllClose(result_value.values, expected)
     self.assertAllEqual(result_value.dense_shape, st.dense_shape)
